question: Which private airline of India has been approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) to conduct drone trials?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s leading private air carrier SpiceJet announced that it has received formal approval from the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) to conduct drone trials.
